Package Users

Class Student

java.lang.Object
Users.User
Users.Student
All Implemented Interfaces:
EnquiryInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
CampCommitteeMember
public class Student extends User implements EnquiryInterface
The Student class represents a user with the role of a student in the system. It extends the User class and implements the EnquiryInterface. This class includes methods for camp-related operations, such as camp registration and withdrawal, as well as methods for managing enquiries.

  • Constructor Details

    • Student

      public Student(String name, String email, String faculty, String password, Boolean isCommitteeMember, String committeeMemberOf)
      Constructs a Student object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the student.
      email - The email address of the student.
      faculty - The faculty of the student.
      password - The password of the student.
      isCommitteeMember - Boolean indicating whether the student is a committee member.
      committeeMemberOf - Name of the camp for which the student is a committee member.

  • Method Details

    • registerCamp

      public void registerCamp(String campName, boolean committeeMember)
      Registers the student for a camp, either as an attendee or a committee member.
      Parameters:
      campName - The name of the camp to register for.
      committeeMember - Boolean indicating whether the student is registering as a committee member.

    • withdrawCamp

      public void withdrawCamp(String campName)
      Withdraws the student from a registered camp.
      Parameters:
      campName - The name of the camp to withdraw from.

    • viewCamps

      public void viewCamps()
      Displays the list of available camps for the student to view.

    • viewRegisteredCamps

      public void viewRegisteredCamps()
      Displays a list of camps to which the student is currently registered. Provides information about each registered camp, including the role of the student (Attendee/Committee Member).

    • isCommitteeMember

      public boolean isCommitteeMember()
      Gets whether the student is a committee member.
      Returns:
      True if the student is a committee member, false otherwise.
